The Japanese government strengthened its policy of signing a joint statement declaring nuclear weapons non-use by the Nuclear Nonproliferation Treaty (NPT) on October 10. It is reported that it is expected to be adopted at the reconsideration meeting of 2015 if the relevant countries agree.

Until now the government continues to refuse a joint statement on nuclear non-humanitarian and non-use, which has become a joint proposal by more than 70 countries such as Switzerland, in relation to the "nuclear umbrella" by the United States, accusations and disappointments from domestic and foreign It is becoming more and more of.

In that sense it is natural policy change and Japan, being the only atomic bombed country, will not be able to bring peace to the world unless it tackles the nuclear disarmament and abolition with the subjectivity.

Four years ago in Central Station we made a strong and clear commitment to extend the postnatal and today we have the joy of having fulfilled!
Four years ago we committed to extend post natal from 3 to 6 months and expand coverage of one third to all working women. We fulfill
Now we send a project to expand the benefit of nurseries to all working women. So, family and work are compatible.
With this new post natal the children will have their mother and father close during their first 6 months of life, which is when they most need them
